description: Assesses informational essay structure and content

levels.4: Engaging introduction that hooks reader and previews topic
levels.2: Introduction is weak or doesn't clearly establish topic

feedback_stems.strength: Your introduction engaged readers while setting up the topic
feedback_stems.growth: Hook readers in your introduction while previewing what you'll cover

levels.4: Clear organization with helpful headings that guide the reader
levels.3: Good organization with some helpful structure
levels.2: Some organization but headings unclear or missing

feedback_stems.strength: Your organization and headings made the essay easy to follow
feedback_stems.growth: Use clear headings to guide readers through your information

levels.4: Information is accurate, detailed, and shows understanding
levels.3: Information is mostly accurate with good detail
levels.2: Some inaccuracies or lacks sufficient detail
levels.1: Information is inaccurate or very thin

feedback_stems.strength: Your information was accurate and detailed
feedback_stems.growth: Add more specific details and make sure facts are accurate

levels.4: Body paragraphs have topic sentences, evidence, and explanation
levels.3: Paragraphs are developed with some structure
levels.2: Paragraphs lack clear structure or development

feedback_stems.strength: Your paragraphs were well-developed with topic sentences and support
feedback_stems.growth: Each paragraph needs a topic sentence, facts/examples, and explanation

levels.4: Conclusion synthesizes key points and provides closure

feedback_stems.strength: Your conclusion effectively synthesized your main points
feedback_stems.growth: Wrap up by synthesizing (not just repeating) your key points
